mapper.insert: insert into tbl_column_board(c_bno, c_title, c_content, userid) values (#{c_bno}, #{c_title}, #{c_content}, #{userid})
insert into tbl_column_pic(c_pno, c_bno, c_picture) values(seq_column_pno.nextval, #{c_bno}, #{c_picture})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_column_board order by c_bno
select a.* from (select * from tbl_column_pic where c_bno=#{c_bno} order by c_pno desc) a where rownum = 1
select * from (select * from tbl_column_board order by c_viewcnt desc) where rownum = 1
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_column_board order by c_viewcnt desc)a) where rnum between 2 and 4
select c_picture from tbl_column_pic where c_bno = #{c_bno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_column_like(c_lno, c_bno, userid) values(seq_column_lno.nextval, #{c_bno}, #{userid})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_column_like where c_bno = #{c_bno} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from tbl_column_like where c_bno = #{c_bno} and userid = #{userid}
